org.rdkit.knime.nodes.fingerprintreadwrite

Class FPSReadWriteUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rdkit.knime.nodes.fingerprintreadwrite.FPSReadWriteUtil
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class FPSReadWriteUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Utility implementation of FPS Reader/Writer. This class is responsible for reading and parsing the FPS file, contains conversion logic from Hex to Binary and vice versa
    Author:
    Sudip Ghosh

    • Method Detail

      • fingerprintValidator

        public static boolean fingerprintValidator(java.lang.String fingStr,
                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> mapFpsHeaders,
                                           boolean setId,
                                           java.util.Set<java.lang.String> setIdentifier)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Deprecated. 
        This function will validate the Fingerprint records and also populate num_bits if not present at header
        Parameters:
        fingStr - concerned fingerprint record to validate
        mapFpsHeaders - map object to contain the header part of FPS files
        setId - boolean to indicate fingerprint id as row id.
        setIdentifier - set object to check duplicacy of fingerpint key .
        Returns:
        boolean after successful or unsuccessful validation
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - while duplicate id found

      • convertBinaryFingerprintsFromHex

        public static long[] convertBinaryFingerprintsFromHex(java.lang.String strHexFing)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Deprecated. 
        This method is responsible for conversion of HexEncoded fingerprints to Binary bits
        Parameters:
        strHexFing - Determines the hex encoded fingerprint record
        Returns:
        long[] Array to return the binary bits
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception thrown during Hex to Binary conversion

      • convertHexFingerprintsFromBin

        public static java.lang.String convertHexFingerprintsFromBin(long[] arrBinFing)
                                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Deprecated. 
        This method is responsible for conversion of Binary bits to HexEncoded fingerprints
        Parameters:
        arrBinFing - Determines the binary bits for a fingerprint record
        Returns:
        String string to return as HexEncoded.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception thrown during Binary to Hex conversion

      • getDateInFPSFormat

        public static java.lang.String getDateInFPSFormat()
        Deprecated. 
        This method returns the current date and time as per the FPS format. This date string will be written to the FPS header.
        Returns:
        String representation of formatted FPS date

      • checkFile

        public static java.io.File checkFile(java.lang.String fileS,
                                     boolean reader,
                                     boolean retError)
                              throws InvalidSettingsException
        Deprecated. 
        This method checks if file protocol is present and returns actual file path. Also checks if the file exists and can be read from the folder.
        Parameters:
        fileS - The string file path.
        reader - true if used for fingerprint reader node, els false
        retError - true if exception required to be thrown, else consume
        Returns:
        File The returned file object.
        Throws:
        InvalidSettingsException - The exception thrown in case of invalid file name is entered.
